Adapts Alchemy's gas+paymaster middleware to viem's new interface.
Uses the non-standard `alchemy_requestGasAndPaymasterAndData` flow.

## Import

```ts
import { alchemyGasAndPaymasterAndDataHooks } from "@account-kit/infra";
```

## Parameters

### \_params

`AlchemyGasAndPaymasterHookParams`

- Configuration parameters

## Returns

`never`
This function is not implemented
